tool_description: Updates existing course information including schedule changes, capacity adjustments, and prerequisite modifications with validation and conflict checking.

update_fields.description: List of fields to update (title, schedule, capacity, prerequisites, instructor, room)

validate_changes.description: Enable validation of changes before applying

notify_students.description: Send notifications to enrolled students about changes

error_messages: Course not found: The specified course_id does not exist.
Field mismatch: update_fields and new_values arrays must have the same length.
Invalid field name: One or more update_fields are not recognized.
Validation failed: One or more new_values failed validation checks.
Update conflict: Changes would create scheduling or capacity conflicts.
Permission denied: Insufficient permissions to update this course.
usage: Provide course_id, update_fields, and corresponding new_values arrays. Enable validate_changes and notify_students flags as needed for safe updates.

failed_updates.description: Fields that could not be updated

validation_warnings.description: Warnings about potential issues with updates
